英文公告.附加說明: [Project:]:Weld Overlay for Reactor Vessel Loop C Hot Leg Nozzle for MNPP Unit 2Tenderer’s basic qualification requirements:Foreign/local Tenderer shall present business registered certificate or established certificate issued by government authority or its authorized institute.Foreign/local contractor or its sub-contractor must have experiences for nuclear power plant in different base metal or Austenitic steel weld overlay repair service. A work experience list certifying that the Tenderer has completed the related works is required.Tenderer’s capability requirements:The Tenderer shall present certified documents testifying that after award it can provide automatic welding equipment, welding procedure, safety analysis, welder’s qualification or professional license for different base metal or Austenitic steel weld overlay repair service for nuclear power plant.In case competence certified documents are provided by a subcontractor, the awarded contractor shall present subcontract to the ENTITY within two weeks after award. If the subcontract is not presented within the said period or the scope subcontracted is not consistent with contractor’s original proposal, the contract award shall be revoked.If certified documents provided are proved to be not genuine after award, the ENTITY shall revoke the award, terminate or rescind the contract in accordance with the Government Procurement Act Article 50.The Tenderer shall submit QA program and Mock-up Weld Overlay / Weld Overlay Repair work plan for the ENTITY’s review.
